name: Iates, Etherym Barrier
text:
If this card is in your hand: you can banish 2 other "Etherym" monsters from your hand and/or field, then Special Summon this monster. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or monster effect: You can shuffle 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters into the Deck; negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Iates, Etherym Barrier" once per turn. Apply the following effects based on the number of your banished "Etherym" monsters with different names.
●2+ "Etherym" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle or by your opponentâ€™s card effects.
●4+ Your opponent cannot target "Etherym" monsters with card effects.
●6+ Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to "Etherym" monster effects.
